title: Metrics category concept, where the list of metrics to be applied together for an specific community and their implementations are related (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the metrics category, according to the rules

oneOf.description: Identifiers used on submission must not begin with OEB. Client tools must use always this pattern to validate
Temporary identifiers internally used must follow this pattern
Identifiers returned by the APIs must follow this pattern

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

orig_id.title: The metrics category original id
orig_id.description: The field is filled in on server side, and it contains the original id used on data submission for this metrics category, used by the community

community_id.title: The community id, owner of this metrics category

metrics_category_contact_ids.title: _id of the contacts of the responsible researchers in charge of the metrics category coordination

metrics.title: The list of metrics in this category

tool_id.title: The optional tool id which computes this metric(s)
